text: let's examine the two different phase
diagrams for water and for carbon

Above This temperature we can find water

This temperature our solid sublimes

and perhaps the more important

between the solid and the liquid line
this line has a negative slope while for
the carbon dioxide phase diagram the
boundary between the solid and liquid is
positive it has a positive slope so it's
increasing here and it's decreasing here
so and this happens because water has

because ice is less dense than uh
